#include<iostream>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>

using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t,n,i,x,y;
	long int suma;
	long int sumb;
	vector< pair<int,int> > v(22);
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--)
	{
		scanf("%d",&n);
	
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&x);
		v[i].first = x;
	}
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		scanf("%d",&y);
		v[i].second = y;
	}
	v[n].first =v[0].first;
	v[n].second = v[0].second;
	suma=sumb=0;
	for(i=0;i<n;i++)
	{
		suma +=(v[i].first*v[i+1].second);
		sumb +=(v[i].second*v[i+1].first);
	}
	double b = abs(suma-sumb);
	printf("%.1lf\n",b/2.0);
	}
	return 0;
}
